Search
Season

Plugin Enabled
Enable / Disable this setting to control if the Trailers plugin is loaded with MediaPortal.
Listed in Home
Enable this setting for the Trailers plugin to appear in the main Home screen menu items.
Listed in My Plugins
Enable this setting for the Trailers plugin to appear in the My Plugins screen menu items.
Max Retries for Web Requests
The maximum number of retries to perform a repeated web request if an attempt fails e.g. times-out.
Web Request Timeout
The amount of time to wait for a response from a web-request.
Web Request Timeout Increment
The amount of time to wait after a failed web-request before retrying.
Web Request Cache Duration
Set the desired duration in minutes for how long to cache web requests, valid values are between 1 and 1440 (24 hours).
Enable Local Trailer Provider
The Local Trailer Provider will search your local drives for trailers, trailers can be stored either with your current media or from a dedicated directory / directories.
Enable TheMovieDb Trailer Provider
TheMovieDb Trailer Provider will return a list of trailers, featurettes, clips and teasers for the specified movie. It\'s the preferred source for online search of trailers.
Enable OnlineVideos Trailer Search Provider
The OnlineVideos Trailer Search Provider acts as a backup so that a manual search can be triggered if no online or local trailers were found.
Search Local Trailers in Current Folder
Enable to search for trailers in the current media\'s folder, typically files be be-side the current media with \'trailer\' in the filename.
Search Local Trailers in Current SubFolder
Enable to search for trailers in a list of specified sub-directories of the current menu e.g. in a \'Trailer\' sub-directory.
Search Local Trailers in Dedicated Directories

Enable to search for trailers in a list of specified dedicated directories, these would be outside of the current media path. By default the OnlineVideos and ShowTimes download directories are used for search.
Enable YouTube Site for Manual Search
The YouTube site is probably the best site in OnlineVideos to perform a manual search, there is a large range of movies trailers available at good quality.
YouTube Movie Search String
Specify the search string used for manual movie trailer searches on YouTube. Special replacement parameters for movies are %title% and %year%.
YouTube TV Show Search String
Specify the search string used for manual tv show trailer searches on YouTube. Special replacement parameters for tv shows are %title%, %airdate% and %year%.
YouTube TV Season Search String
Specify the search string used for manual tv season trailer searches on YouTube. Special replacement parameters for tv seasons are %title%, %airdate%, %year% and %season%.
YouTube TV Episode Search String
Specify the search string used for manual tv episode trailer searches on YouTube. Special replacement parameters for tv episodes are %title%, %airdate%, %year%, %season%, %episode% and %episodename%.
YouTube TV Episode Specials Search String

Specify the search string used for manual tv episode special trailer searches on YouTube. Special replacement parameters for tv episode specials are %title%, %airdate%, %year%, %season%, %episode% and %episodename%.
Enable iTunes Site for Manual Search
The iTunes Movie Trailer site is a dedicated trailer site, this is a good choice for more recent movies.
Enable IMDb Site for Manual Search
The IMDb Movie Trailer site is a dedicated trailer site, this is a good choice for more recent movies and also allows for exact trailer searches using the IMDb ID.
Enable Aggressive Search for Local Trailers

Aggressive search will continue to find trailers from the various enabled local search methods even when there has already been match(es) found. This setting is not needed unless you have trailers for the same movie scattered in more than one place.
Skip Online Providers if Local Trailers Found
If there are local trailers found in search, then immediately show/play result or continue to search for online trailers and present both results.
Auto Play on Single Local or Online Trailer
If there is only a single local or online trailer found, then automatically play trailer. When disabled (default) a menu of results will be shown including manual search providers.
Enable Auto Download Trailers for MovingPictures Library
Enable to automatically download trailers for movies in your MovingPictures library.
Enable Auto Download Trailers for My Films Library
Enable to automatically download trailers for movies in your My Films library.
Enable Auto Download Trailers for My Videos Library
Enable to automatically download trailers for movies in your My Videos library.
Auto Download Startup Delay
Sets the delay on startup before checking your plugin libraries for new trailers to download.
Auto Download Interval
Sets the interval for library checks to see if new movies have been added for automatic trailer download.
Auto Download Update Interval
Sets the interval to re-check movies previously checked that have no trailers. New trailers may have been added online between this value.
Auto Download Video Quality
Set the quality settings for video download from youtube trailers, if the desired quality is not available then the next lowest quality will be downloaded.
Enable Auto Download of Trailers
Checks if the video type is a trailer for automatic trailer downloads.
Enable Auto Download of Teasers
Checks if the video type is a teaser for automatic trailer downloads.
Enable Auto Download of Featurettes
Checks if the video type is a featurette for automatic trailer downloads.
Enable Auto Download of Clips
Checks if the video type is a clip for automatic trailer downloads.
Enable Auto Download Cleanup
Enable this to remove any trailers from disk if the associated movie is no longer in your plugin libraries.
Preferred Trailer Language
Set the language to download trailers from supported online providers. Language must be a valid two letter country code in iso_639_1 format e.g. fr, en, de, el, it, nl, es.
Fallback to English Trailers
Enable this to fallback to English trailers when no preferred language trailers exist online.
Always Get English Trailers
Enable this to get English trailers in addition to trailers in your preferred language.
Reshow Menu After Trailer Playback
Enable this to reshow the menu after playback of a Trailer. If there is only a single local/online trailer available then this setting will be ignored.
